planets.name: Mercury
planets.description: A very hot planet, closest to the sun.

planets.name: Earth
planets.description: There is something very familiar about this planet.

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.description: A gas giant, with a noticeable red spot.

planets.name: Saturn
planets.description: This planet has beautiful rings around it.

planets.name: Uranus
planets.description: Strangely, this planet rotates around on its side.

planets.name: Neptune
planets.description: A very cold planet, furthest from the sun.

planets.name: Pluto
planets.description: I don't care what they say - it's a planet.
